semantic_title: Routine Outpatient Prenatal Visit Coding Guidelines
section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 15. Chapter 15: Pregnancy, Childbirth, and the Puerperium > b. Selection of OB Principal or First-listed Diagnosis > 1) Routine outpatient prenatal visits

content.full_text: For routine outpatient prenatal visits when no complications are present, a code from category Z34, Encounter for supervision of normal pregnancy, should be used as the first-listed diagnosis. These codes should not be used in conjunction with chapter 15 codes. (Evidence: pg no: 64, L47-L51)
content.summary: Guidelines for coding routine prenatal visits without complications (Evidence: pg no: 64, L47-L51)
key_concepts: Routine prenatal visit coding (Evidence: pg no: 64, L47-L48)
Z34 category usage (Evidence: pg no: 64, L49-L50)
Exclusion of Chapter 15 codes (Evidence: pg no: 64, L50-L51)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Use Z34 codes for routine prenatal visits without complications (Evidence: pg no: 64, L48-L50)
detailed_rules.explanation: When no complications are present during routine prenatal care, use supervision of normal pregnancy codes (Evidence: pg no: 64, L48-L50)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Do not use Chapter 15 codes with Z34 codes (Evidence: pg no: 64, L50-L51)
detailed_rules.explanation: Z34 codes are mutually exclusive with Chapter 15 pregnancy complication codes (Evidence: pg no: 64, L50-L51)

workflow_steps: Step 1: Determine if prenatal visit is routine without complications
Step 2: Select appropriate Z34 code for supervision of normal pregnancy
Step 4: Do not add any Chapter 15 codes

code_ranges.description: Encounter for supervision of normal pregnancy (Evidence: pg no: 64, L49-L50)
code_ranges.requirement: Use as first-listed diagnosis for routine visits
usage_rules: Do not use with Chapter 15 codes (Evidence: pg no: 64, L50-L51)
Only for visits without complications (Evidence: pg no: 64, L48)

code_ranges.description: Pregnancy, Childbirth, and the Puerperium codes (Evidence: pg no: 64, L50-L51)
code_ranges.requirement: Do not use with Z34 codes
usage_rules: Mutually exclusive with Z34 codes (Evidence: pg no: 64, L50-L51)

references_to.title: Supervision of High-Risk Pregnancy
references_to.explanation: Contrasts with high-risk pregnancy supervision coding

coding_scenarios.scenario: 28-week routine prenatal visit with normal findings
coding_scenarios.documentation_example: 28-week prenatal visit, patient doing well, normal fetal heart tones, no complaints
step_by_step: Step 1: Identify as routine prenatal visit without complications
Step 2: Select Z34.02 (supervision of normal first pregnancy, second trimester)
Step 4: Do not add any O codes

correct_coding.rationale: Routine prenatal visit without complications uses Z34 category (Evidence: pg no: 64, L48-L50)

incorrect_coding.rationale: Should not combine Z34 codes with Chapter 15 codes
incorrect_coding.common_mistake: Adding Chapter 15 codes to routine prenatal visits

warnings: Never use Chapter 15 codes with Z34 codes (Evidence: pg no: 64, L50-L51)
best_practices: Use Z34 codes only for truly routine visits without complications (Evidence: pg no: 64, L48)
Ensure no complications are documented before using Z34
common_mistakes: Using Chapter 15 codes with Z34 codes (Evidence: pg no: 64, L50-L51)
Using Z34 when complications are present
tips: Review visit documentation for any complications before coding
Z34 codes indicate completely normal pregnancy supervision
implementation_notes: Requires clear documentation of routine, uncomplicated visit
